title: This is your lung
creator_credit: Verity Films, Film Producers Guild and Oswald Skilbeck
brief_description: Designed to discourage cigarette smoking. Uses a smoking machine to show a variety of foreign matter in cigarette smoke, including a cancer-causing tar. Deals with a patient who has a smoker’s cough, but is ultimately found to be suffering from lung cancer.
